sci-desc: Mange citation resources with the help of [https://semantic-mediawiki.org Semantic MediaWiki].
sci-scite-parser-not-enabled-namespace: #scite can not be used on a namespace that is not enabled for Semantic MediaWiki
sci-scite-parser-no-type: #scite was unable to determine a reference type for «$1».
sci-scite-parser-no-citation-text: #scite was unable to render a citation text for reference «$1» with type «$2».
sci-datavalue-empty-reference: The citation reference is expected not be empty.
sci-datavalue-no-valid-doi-format: "$1" as DOI value doesn't match the expected format.
sci-datavalue-no-valid-pmcid-format: "$1" as PMCID value doesn't match the expected format.
sci-tooltip-citation-lookup-failure: Failed to retrieve an appropriate citation from the back-end.
sci-property-definition: A list of #scite identifiers that are mapped to user-defined properties. Please be aware that changes to existing entries require a rebuild of property assignments. foo-id|bar-property
sci-template-definition:
A list of citation types that are mapped to predefined templates containing citation formatting rules. 
 foo-type|bar-template
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_cite_key: "$1" is a predefined property that identifies a citation resource and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SemanticCite Semantic Cite] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_cite_ref: "$1" is a predefined property that identifies a citation resource when used as reference (e.g. in-text reference) and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SemanticCite Semantic Cite] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_cite_tex: "$1" is a predefined property that contains a preformatted text and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SemanticCite Semantic Cite] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_cite: "$1" is a predefined property provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SemanticCite Semantic Cite] extension that describes all elements of a citation and is stored as subobject.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_doi: "$1" is a predefined property provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SemanticCite Semantic Cite] extension that represents a Digital Object Identifier.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sci_pmcid: "$1" is a predefined property provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SemanticCite Semantic Cite] extension that represents a PubMed Central reference number (PMCID).
